AccountId.description: The account associated with the occurrence.

AttributedUserId.description: The user the research is attributed to.

CaseId.description: The case that delivers the research.

ContactId.description: The contact associated with the occurrence.

DateCollected.description: The date the information about the occurrence was collected.

EstimatedValue.description: The estimated monetary value of the occurrence.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

Name.description: An auto-generated string or number assigned to the party philanthropic occurrence.

OccurrenceType.description: The type of occurrence, such as donation history, net worth, volunteer hours, or inheritance.

OtherSource.description: An occurrence source that isn't a Salesforce record.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

ParticipantId.description: The participant contact involved in collecting the research.

PartyPhilanthropicAssessmentId.description: The party philanthropic assessment associated with the occurrence.

PartyPhilanthropicRsrchPrflId.description: The research profile associated with the occurrence.

RelatedOrganizationId.description: The account of the organization that provided the occurrence.

ResearchEndDate.description: The end date of the research, used to measure the duration of the research period and assess the efficiency of the research.

ResearchHours.description: The total hours spent researching the occurrence, used to track resource allocation and time spent on researching each prospect.

ResearchSharedDate.description: The date when the completed research is shared with the relationship officer, used to ensure transparency and track the flow of information in prospect engagement.

ResearchStartDate.description: The start date of the research, used to create a timeline for the research process and track the duration of the research phase.

ResearchType.description: The classification of research for the occurrence.

SourceId.description: The business milestone, life event, or interaction summary associated wiith the occurrence.

SourceType.description: The type of source, such as external interaction, internal data, third-party data, or public records.

VerificationType.description: Specifies whether the occurrence is known or inferred.
